notes: Heals from any spell damage the owner deals against enemy or allied units, except from the abilities listed here.
Does not heal from damage done against buildings, wards or self.
Heals from all 3 damage types (after all reductions) and from most instantly killing effects.
Damage done by summons (including wards) do not spell lifesteal.
abilities.description: 10% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type. Lifesteal reduced to 2% against creeps.

additionalInformation: Multiple instances of spell lifesteal from the same source do not stack.
Spell lifesteal from different sources stacks additively.
name: Voodoo Mask
description: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.
